name: Master Plumber
description:
My entry for the Kenney Jam 2021 - Theme: Rotation

Classic puzzle game where you have to rotate your pieces to make the water flow from one end to the other of the board.

Developed with Pixi.js, matter-js and React

Things that didn't make it in:

  • Water pressure (time limit mechanic)
  • Better difficulty scaling
  • Multiple randomly selected locked pipes

Credits:

Assets and SFX by https://kenney.nl/

Music generated with https://www.aiva.ai/
